nodes.name: KnowledgeNexus
nodes.description: A sophisticated, AI-powered visualization tool that transforms static Markdown documents into immersive, interactive 3D knowledge graphs.

nodes.name: Markdown Documents
nodes.description: Static text documents used as input for KnowledgeNexus's transformation process.

nodes.name: Knowledge Graphs
nodes.description: Immersive, interactive 3D representations of entities and relationships, visualized by KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: Google
nodes.description: The technology company that developed the Gemini AI models and GenAI SDK.

nodes.name: Gemini 2.5 Flash
nodes.description: Google's AI model leveraged by KnowledgeNexus for real-time semantic analysis and entity extraction.

nodes.name: React
nodes.description: The core JavaScript framework (version 19) used for building the KnowledgeNexus user interface.

nodes.name: TypeScript
nodes.description: The typed superset of JavaScript used as a core programming language for KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: React Force Graph 3D
nodes.description: A library built on Three.js, enabling immersive 3D force-directed graph visualization in KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: Three.js
nodes.description: A JavaScript 3D library fundamental for WebGL rendering and interactive visualizations.

nodes.name: Google GenAI SDK
nodes.description: The SDK (`@google/genai`) used by KnowledgeNexus to integrate with Google's AI services.

nodes.name: Tailwind CSS
nodes.description: A utility-first CSS framework used for styling the modern user interface of KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: Lucide React
nodes.description: A library providing intuitive SVG icons for the KnowledgeNexus application.

nodes.name: Node.js
nodes.description: The JavaScript runtime environment (v18+) required for running KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: Google Gemini API Key
nodes.description: A valid API key required to access Google's Gemini AI services.

nodes.name: Google AI Studio
nodes.description: The online platform where developers can obtain a Google Gemini API Key.

nodes.name: MIT License
nodes.description: The permissive open-source license under which KnowledgeNexus is distributed.

nodes.name: Intelligent Extraction
nodes.description: KnowledgeNexus's capability to parse unstructured text into structured node-link data using AI.

nodes.name: Immersive 3D Visualization
nodes.description: A key feature allowing deep exploration of complex data structures with zoom, pan, and rotation.

nodes.name: Semantic Categorization
nodes.description: Automatic classification of entities into types (People, Concepts, Technologies, Locations) with distinct visual signatures.

nodes.name: Reactive & Performant Rendering
nodes.description: Ensures a smooth 60FPS rendering experience even during complex force simulations.

nodes.name: Glassmorphism UI
nodes.description: A modern, slate-themed interface featuring backdrop blurs, smooth animations, and intuitive interactions.

nodes.name: Extraction Pipeline
nodes.description: The step-by-step process KnowledgeNexus uses to extract and prepare data for visualization.

nodes.name: Prompt Engineering
nodes.description: The technique of constructing complex system prompts to define the AI's persona and task.

nodes.name: Schema Enforcement
nodes.description: The process of requiring the AI to adhere to a strict JSON structure for its output.

nodes.name: JSON Schema
nodes.description: A standard for defining the structure and validating JSON data.

nodes.name: Normalization
nodes.description: Frontend step of parsing AI-generated JSON, adjusting node sizes, and mapping types to colors.

nodes.name: WebGL Renderer
nodes.description: The underlying rendering component responsible for displaying the 3D knowledge graph.

nodes.name: Open-source Community
nodes.description: A collaborative group where contributions are greatly appreciated for project development.

nodes.name: Contributions
nodes.description: The act of adding features, fixing bugs, or improving documentation for the project.

nodes.name: Pull Request
nodes.description: A common mechanism in open-source for submitting proposed changes to a repository.

nodes.name: Knowledge Graph Architect
nodes.description: The persona adopted by the AI (Gemini) when processing documents for KnowledgeNexus.

nodes.name: Upload Zone
nodes.description: The initial cinematic area in KnowledgeNexus where users upload Markdown or text files.

nodes.name: Details Sidebar
nodes.description: A panel revealing entity descriptions and importance scores upon node interaction.

nodes.name: GitHub
nodes.description: The platform used to host the KnowledgeNexus repository, enabling cloning and contributions.

nodes.name: AI Engine
nodes.description: The core component within KnowledgeNexus responsible for AI processing and semantic analysis.

nodes.name: Data Structures
nodes.description: Complex organizational formats for data, which KnowledgeNexus visualizes.

nodes.name: Entity Relationships
nodes.description: The connections and links between extracted entities, forming the core of a knowledge graph.
